channel.title: Blogspot
channel.description: Blogspot is a custom Static Site Generator (SSG) built with Node.js and Showdown.js. It converts Markdown files from Obsidian into fast, scalable, and customizable static HTML websites. Perfect for bloggers, writers, and developers seeking simplicity and flexibility.

item.title: Why I created this template
item.description: I always wanted to create things that come to my mind. A while ago, Framer made a lot of things possible, sparking my curiosity. And so I began.

item.title: Supported styles
item.description: This documentation covers the supported Markdown styles and tags for this project. Use this as a quick reference to format your content effectively.

item.title: Blogspot template doc
item.description: This documentation explains how to set up the Blogspot template for the first time and then use it seamlessly afterward to create your personal blog.

item.title: Why blog?
item.description: A personal perspective on how blogging offers more freedom and control than social media and why sharing your ideas and experiences in your own space matters.

item.title: Script execution demo
item.description: View a step-by-step demonstration of the script execution process, covering initialization, updates, and synchronization.

item.title: Markdown and HTML: History, "evolution", and 'current' state
item.description: Explore the detailed histories, key milestones, and current states of Markdown and HTML. Discover their origins, evolution, and significance in web development.
